As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future or make guarantees about scientific discoveries, but what I can say is that modern technology has provided unprecedented opportunities for advancements in biomedical research. Technological advancements such as advanced computing, big data analytics, gene editing, and immunotherapy have already contributed to the development of personalized medicine, and provided new treatments for an increasing number of diseases.

While it is difficult to predict whether we will one day be able to cure all diseases, there is no doubt that the pace of biomedical research and the development of new treatments is a testament to the collective human knowledge and progress.

It is essential to continue investing in biomedical research and to further pursue scientific knowledge and research into the underlying causes of various diseases. As progress is made on all fronts, we may end up significantly mitigating the effects of many diseases and changing their impact on human life.

In summary, it may not be possible to cure all diseases anytime soon, but biomedical research and technological advancements continue to provide hope and possibilities for the development of new treatments and cures.
